page.title: 10Our Lady Queen of Martyrs.
page.content: We visited the Church and discovered the following- St. Mary's was built in 1871 and is 114 years old. St. Mary's was consecrated in 1895. There are statues of the Sacred Heart, the Pieta and Mary Queen of Martyrs. The frieze behind the altar shows the 7 Sorrows of Our Lady. The two Saints on the altar are of St. Charles Borromeo and St. Philip Neri. In the churchyard there is a cross and it is the grave of Father Fortin,founder of our parish.The oldest gravestone is about 1806.The oldest gravestones are nearest the church.Most of us have ancestors buried there. St.John Boste is our local saint.One day he was saying Mass at Waterhouses, the home of Mr.William Caxton.He was betrayed by one of the congregration, taken to Durham and York and executed.
